QuestData.Title: An Audacious Advance
QuestData.Description: Directly west of here you will find the Halaani Basin. Within the basin are the twin clefts of Nagrand: Northwind and Southwind. Boulderfist shock troops use the clefts to hide their ogre mounds.$B$BI need you to track down those troops and kill all that you encounter in the name of Mag'har.
QuestData.LogDescription: Jorin Deadeye at Garadar in Nagrand has asked that you slay 10 Boulderfist Warriors and 10 Boulderfist Mages.
QuestData.CompletionText: They must be reminded that we are a force to be reckoned with in this region.
QuestData.RewardText: If this does not freeze the blood in their veins, nothing will. You have done the Mag'har justice, $N. And for justice, Mag'har rewards greatly.
